title: Doesn't beat the original
review: Great cinematography and cast. There's nothing more that they could do with the script that was given. I feel direction is what failed this film from being perfect. The pacing is slow and story a bit all over the place in my opinion. Sigh...and I loved the original - ah well. A decent film, but not a great film!

title: Prefer the first
review: The action sequences and even gore animations weren't as compelling in this film. The first was better.

title: Wow
review: Such a well written and disturbing psychological crime thriller that will leave a bitter taste in your mouth all the way through.

title: Beautiful
review: Can't get enough of this film. A psychological thriller that will have you glued to the screen. Fine performances and a nice soundtrack.

title: comedic war film with a message
review: A film which gives power to the victims through comedy during WW2. I'm glad we can laugh and overcome our dark past through such movies

title: Fun ride
review: Sure there's some cheesy moments amidst a serious plotline- but this film does it so well combining the 'elements' so to speak!

title: Iconic
review: Hanks is a fine actor and brings Forrest to live in this gorgeous film with some very memorable moments- particularly his heartwarming relationship with Lt Dan and Bubba. Well worth the watch

title: Mixed feelings
review: I found the British one more raw and disturbing than this. I guess sequels often can't beat the originals. This film definitely has its moments. The violence and stories of the individuals are very disturbing and leave a sick taste in your mouth. Definitely still enjoyable when you're in the mood for a horror film.

title: Really good Christian Bale movie
review: Old as it is, one of his best - forget Dark Knight where he had no personality- this film will introduce you to a very different side of Bale. What's more commendable is the sheer weight loss he endured for the role - what commitment! Very raw, very dark and definitely worth the watch.

title: Mess
review: This film takes the medal for the worst comedy of all time. Poor taste even in today's time

title: Great but long
review: This film follows a tale of antiheroes And villains - well portrayed by the likes of ledger and eckhart. Bale is mediocre as always in this franchise. It was a bit long but an enjoyable watch

title: Tarantino's best
review: Love this film - truly a legend amongst stylized action films of the modern era

title: Get the tissues out
review: This is a touching film with brilliant performances by Hanks and Duncan - check it out!

title: Disturbing
review: A very disturbing film and taboo area for the time. I loved Hopkins in this. I felt some of the violence was a bit gratuitous but didn't detract from it being a well acted and well written film

title: Comic style drama
review: It was a great stylized action adventure film without a lot of substance in the writing. Character development was lacking. Otherwise an enjoyable watch

title: Bleak and disturbing
review: An all time classic horror/psychological thriller. I still get chills when I watch this film. Outstanding performances all around led by gyllenhal
